participant_1.background:
I spend my weekends training for triathlons and dreaming about travelling.
i watch every football game at alabama.
I finally got a new graphics card for my computer so I can play Quake at a higher resolution!
I take my pets to my lake in the backyard every day and watch them swim as I drink tea.
I enjoy visiting the beach, but my favorite exotic place is the island of Bali.

participant_2.background:
I went to a local antique store and bought a beautiful vase that I now display in my living room.
I'd brag about my knowledge of the Beatles' music and history.
i spend as much time as i can with my family.
I exercise daily to keep my health in check and to have enough energy to keep up with my pets.
i live on a boat.

content.text: Hi, I'm a huge fan of the Beatles!
Me too! I'd brag about my knowledge of their music and history.
Amazing! I've read a bunch of books about them.
That's awesome! Have you ever been to Liverpool?
No, I haven't. I'd love to go someday though.
It's a great city! I live on a boat there.
Wow, that sounds amazing! I bet you get to see some beautiful views.
I do! I love taking my dog for walks on the beach.
That sounds so relaxing. I love going to the beach.
Me too! It's one of my favorite places to be.
Do you live on your boat full-time?
Yes, I do. I love the freedom it gives me.
That's awesome! I've always wanted to live on a boat.
It's a great experience. You should try it sometime.
